member.name: PKU2U_CREDUI_CONTEXT.Version
member.summary: The version number of the context. This must be PKU2U_CREDUI_CONTEXT_VERSION.

member.name: PKU2U_CREDUI_CONTEXT.cbHeaderLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure, not including the structure that follows it.

member.name: PKU2U_CREDUI_CONTEXT.cbStructureLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure, including the structure that follows it.

member.name: PKU2U_CREDUI_CONTEXT.CertArrayCount
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the structure that follows this structure.

member.name: PKU2U_CREDUI_CONTEXT.CertArrayOffset
member.summary: The number of bytes from the beginning of this structure in memory to the beginning of the structure that follows this structure.
